raytracer.engine
Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
  raytracer.engine.Matrix

public final class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object

A Basic matrix implementation. This is an adapted version of Matrix.java from http://introcs.cs.princeton.edu/java/95linear/Matrix.java.html.

Author:
Karsten Daemen

          create matrix based on 2d array, columns first based.
